trajectory_plots.name: nominal_trajectory_3d.png
trajectory_plots.title: Nominal Trajectory - 3D View
trajectory_plots.description: 3D visualization of nominal hypersonic reentry trajectory showing altitude vs. downrange vs. crossrange with Earth surface reference

trajectory_plots.name: altitude_vs_time.png
trajectory_plots.title: Altitude History
trajectory_plots.description: Vehicle altitude profile throughout the reentry trajectory, showing descent from 120 km to 30 km over 1450 seconds

trajectory_plots.name: velocity_vs_time.png
trajectory_plots.title: Velocity Profile
trajectory_plots.description: Vehicle velocity magnitude decreasing from 7.5 km/s to 285 m/s due to atmospheric drag

trajectory_plots.name: heat_rate_profile.png
trajectory_plots.title: Heat Rate Profile
trajectory_plots.description: Aerodynamic heating rate peaking at 205 MW/mÂ² during maximum dynamic pressure phase

monte_carlo_plots.name: monte_carlo_histograms.png
monte_carlo_plots.title: Monte Carlo Results Distributions
monte_carlo_plots.description: Probability distributions of key performance metrics from 1000-sample Monte Carlo analysis with fitted distributions

monte_carlo_plots.name: correlation_matrix.png
monte_carlo_plots.title: Parameter Correlation Matrix
monte_carlo_plots.description: Pearson correlation coefficients between input parameters and output metrics showing strongest correlations

monte_carlo_plots.name: scatter_plots.png
monte_carlo_plots.title: Parameter-Output Relationships
monte_carlo_plots.description: Scatter plots showing relationships between atmospheric density factor vs heat rate (r=0.78) and other key parameter pairs

monte_carlo_plots.name: confidence_intervals.png
monte_carlo_plots.title: Confidence Intervals
monte_carlo_plots.description: 90%, 95%, and 99% confidence intervals for mission-critical outputs with reliability metrics

sensitivity_plots.name: sobol_indices_bar.png
sensitivity_plots.title: Sobol Sensitivity Indices
sensitivity_plots.description: First-order and total-effect sensitivity indices showing atmospheric density as most critical parameter (56% average influence)

sensitivity_plots.name: sensitivity_spider.png
sensitivity_plots.title: Sensitivity Spider Plot
sensitivity_plots.description: Radar chart showing relative importance of parameters for each output with atmospheric density dominating heat rate predictions

sensitivity_plots.name: interaction_heatmap.png
sensitivity_plots.title: Parameter Interactions
sensitivity_plots.description: Heatmap visualization of second-order parameter interactions showing key coupling effects

optimization_plots.name: optimization_trade_study.png
optimization_plots.title: Entry Angle Trade Study
optimization_plots.description: Performance trade-offs for different entry flight path angles showing optimal downrange vs computational difficulty

optimization_plots.name: convergence_history.png
optimization_plots.title: Optimization Convergence
optimization_plots.description: SQP convergence history showing objective function improvement and constraint satisfaction over iterations

optimization_plots.name: success_rate_analysis.png
optimization_plots.title: Success Rate Analysis
optimization_plots.description: Optimization success rates by entry angle showing degradation from 94% (shallow) to 53% (extreme) entries

statistical_plots.name: distribution_fits.png
statistical_plots.title: Distribution Fitting Analysis
statistical_plots.description: Goodness-of-fit analysis showing normal distribution for final altitude, log-normal for downrange, Weibull for heat rate

statistical_plots.name: reliability_analysis.png
statistical_plots.title: Mission Reliability Assessment
statistical_plots.description: Reliability metrics showing 75% overall mission success probability with component-level breakdowns
